text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed! Baroi sumo halol nest, ki zanonro meros gired va onho noxus ʙosand; va onhoro man' nakuned az nikoh ʙo har ki xohand, to ʙa'ze on ciro ki ʙa onho dodaed, ʙa dast ored; magar in ki oskoro kori ʙad ʙikunand! Va ʙa onho ʙa tavri soista zindagi kuned va agar ham onhoro namepisanded, pas sojad, ki sumo cizero namepisanded va Alloh dar on xajr va nekii farovonero qaror medihad
